name: CyclingDeal Bike Bicycle Children Kids Training Handle - Balance Buddy - for 22.2mm to 28.6mm Seatpost - Two-Hand Holding
short_description: SAFETY FIRST: Ensuring your child's safety is our top priority. That's why we've created a Kids Training Handle that is built with one-piece, heavy-duty Cro-Mo steel—no welding involved. We recognize the significant force exerted when a bicycle falls, and our training handle is designed to effortlessly handle such situations with ease. Rest assured, your child will be in good hands with our reliable and sturdy handle. Patented Design, PAT. 18/078.061.

COMPATIBILITY: Compatible with round seatpost diameter: 22.2mm and 25.4mm with shim, 28.6mm without shim. However, it is crucial to ensure that the seatpost is securely positioned in the seat tube before installing the balanced handle. Your child's safety is paramount, and we strongly advise double-checking the seatpost's stability prior to attaching the training handle.

ENHANCED STABILITY WITH TWO-HANDED DESIGN: Our Kids Training Handle features a two-handed hold design, providing superior stability compared to a one-handed hold. We understand that maintaining balance and control is crucial for young riders, especially during the training phase. With the elongated grip of our handle, your child can enjoy a comfortable and secure training experience, ensuring they stay in control of their bike while learning and progressing their skills.

EASY TO USE: This handle is the perfect accessory to help children learn how to ride a bike with ease. It simplifies the process and provides added support and stability, allowing your child to build their confidence while mastering this essential skill. Friendly Reminder: Safety First! We highly recommend using a kid's helmet whenever your child is riding their bike.
ORDER NOW, WORRY-FREE! We're so confident about the product quality that we can provide a lifetime warranty!
